${ModID}:RetainerStrike.NAME: Retainer Strike
${ModID}:RetainerStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL One random card in your hand NL has Retain this turn.
${ModID}:RetainerStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose one card in your hand. NL It has Retain this turn.

${ModID}:NobleStrikeAusterity.NAME: Austerity
${ModID}:NobleStrikeAusterity.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold and draw a card.

${ModID}:Soulstone.NAME: Soulstone
${ModID}:Soulstone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Startup: gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WindShield.NAME: Wind Shield
${ModID}:WindShield.DESCRIPTION: Discard any amount of cards. Gain !B! Block for each discarded card.

${ModID}:Forcefield.NAME: Forcefield
${ModID}:Forcefield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. If you spent at least 3 !E!, gain 1 Blur.
${ModID}:Forcefield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X+1 times. If you spent at least !E!, gain 1 Blur.

${ModID}:MiningStrike.NAME: Mining Strike
${ModID}:MiningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ThrowSoulstonesTribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:ThrowSoulstonesTribute.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 10: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies AND play this card again.
${ModID}:ThrowSoulstonesTribute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 10: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies AND play this card again.

${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.NAME: Boundless Talent
${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 5: Copy one card in your hand. ${ModID}:Austerity: Draw until you have !M!.  NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:BoundlessTalent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 5: Copy one card in your hand. ${ModID}:Austerity: Draw until you have !M!. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:BoundlessTalentTribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:BoundlessTalentTribute.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 5: Copy one card in your hand.

${ModID}:RoyalSupplyLines.NAME: Royal Supply Lines
${ModID}:RoyalSupplyLines.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, draw 2 extra cards. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to 2 cards.

${ModID}:AlchemyTime.NAME: Alchemy Time
DESCRIPTION: Pay 25 Gold to gain a Potion. NL When you use a Potion, draw
cards. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: gain a Potion Slot and 75 Gold.

${ModID}:MoreSupplies.NAME: More Supplies!
${ModID}:MoreSupplies.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 30: fill your Potion Belt with random Potions. ${ModID}:Austerity: Gain a random Potion.

${ModID}:MoreSuppliesTribute.NAME: Tribute
${ModID}:MoreSuppliesTribute.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Tribute 30: fill your Potion Belt with random Potions.

${ModID}:NobleForm.NAME: Noble Form
${ModID}:NobleForm.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, draw a card. When you lose HP, gain 5 Gold.
${ModID}:NobleForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you discard or play a card, draw a card. When you lose Gold or HP, gain 5 Gold.
